instruction: Compose a letter to your best friend who has just moved abroad.
output:
Dear Best Friend,

I wanted to reach out and wish you all the best on your new journey! I can’t believe you have moved all the way across the world and are exploring a new place and culture. I know you’re going to make amazing memories and I can’t wait to hear all about it when you get back.

I hope this letter finds you well in your new home and that you’re feeling happy and fulfilled. I miss having you over for game nights and movie marathons, but I’m sure all the new experiences you’re having more than make up for it. If there’s ever anything you need, don’t hesitate to reach out.

I love you, always.
Lots of love,
[Your Name]
